articles.author: Delfin Dioquino
articles.title: 'Tough' Kai Sotto impresses Tab Baldwin after first Gilas Pilipinas stint - Rappler
articles.description: Kai Sotto, 19, holds his own against more experienced foes as he helps Gilas Pilipinas sweep the FIBA Asia Cup Qualifiers
articles.content: Sotto's finest game numbers-wise came in their stunning 81-78 victory over Korea, where he churned out 11 points, 7 rebounds, 2 assists, and 1 steal in only 18 minutes.

articles.title: BSP seen to hold rates steady at its June policy meeting - pna.gov.ph
articles.description: MANILA – Fragile economic situation in the Philippines due to the pandemic is expected to be the reason for the Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas (BSP) to keep rates steady at record-low 2 percent to date. In its Asia Pacific Economic Preview issued on Monday, Mood…

articles.title: Axiata, Telenor, Digi sign agreements to merge Malaysian mobile ops - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: Axiata Group Bhd, Telenor Asia Pte Ltd and Digi.Com Bhd have signed the transaction agreements for the proposed merger of Celcom Axiata Bhd and Digi.

articles.description: The Snake Eyes actor said the arrival of his daughter in March has been "life changing".
